SEARCH
Package net.minecraftforge.client

Klasse ColorResolverManager

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.client.ColorResolverManager
public final class ColorResolverManager extends Object
Manager for custom ColorResolver instances, collected via RegisterColorHandlersEvent.ColorResolvers.
